movies.loadedWithErrors: Something went wrong during getting movies from DB.

notifications.loadingError: Something went wrong, the movie isn't got from DB.
notifications.updateError: Something went wrong during updating the movie.
notifications.addError: Something went wrong during adding the movie.
notifications.deleteError: Something went wrong during deleting the movie.
notifications.loadingErrorFromKP: Something went wrong, the movie isn't got from Kinopoisk.
notifications.loadedFromKP: The movie is loaded successfully from Kinopoisk.

settings.title: Settings
settings.languageHint: The selected language effects only for labels and general titles, but not the data stored on the server
settings.qualityHint: You can set default quality value for adding and updating movies if that field is empty, that value automatically will be inserted to form control
settings.extensionHint: You can set default extension value for adding and updating movies if that field is empty, that value automatically will be inserted to form control

notifications.loadingError: Something went wrong, settings aren't got from DB.
notifications.updateError: Something went wrong during update settings.

auth.title: Authentication
auth.label: Input secret key to get grand access
auth.authRequestHint: Overall, the application is currently limited to readonly mode. To gain full access for creating, updating, and deleting items, please input secret key and click the 'Apply' button.
auth.loggedInFailed: You have not been authenticated. The inputted secret key is wrong.
auth.tokenIsExpired: Your token has expired. Please sign in again.
auth.loggedOutSuccessfully: You have been logged out successfully.
